entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Kestrel Picks the Wrong SSL Certificate #51688
  • Support for Pushed Authorization Requests in OidcHandler #51686
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot #51684
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapipublishaot #51683
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #51682
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #51681
  • Use "FluentUI for Blazor 3" for Templates and CRUD #51680
  • Failing Test(s): RequestPathBaseTests #51679
  • ASP .NET 8 RC2 Routing & UseStaticFiles with Additional Assembly #51677
  • Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Client.targets on Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Client NuGet package has invalid XML #51675
  • Support a better version of post/redirect/get #51674
  • Blazor WASM significant slower load time in MS Edge Dev #51670
  • app.UsePathBase(pathBase) add support to read pathbase from request header to handle multitenant application #51669
  • How can I host multiple web apps in one kestresl on Linux? #51667

Closed

  • Benchmark stopped running: QueryCompilation #51651
  • Was Username field really removed in .Net 8 rc-1? #50702
  • Blazor ASP.NET Core Hosted on Azure : error with JwtBearer #51071
  • .Net8 Identity with ef core #51129
  • Confirmation email sent after registering user via Identity API has link with relative path, should be only code #51146
  • Perf improvement: json #51650
  • Skip several Http3RequestTests #50833
  • Blazor Auto RC2 is unresponsive in server mode #51356
  • Failed to load dotnet.js on InteractiveWebAssembly render mode #51384

PullRequests

Created

  • Show user friendly error when network requests fail #51690
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Show user friendly message for streaming rendering failures #51687
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Remove extra quote. #51685
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Fix trimming issue affecting Blazor apps with WebAssembly interactivity #51665
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Unquarantined some HTTP/3 tests #51668
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Update SDK to 23523.1 #51588
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Improve path search in Kestrel parsing #51535
    Perf, feature-kestrel, area-networking
  • Documenting the new help-wanted process #51664
    area-infrastructure
  • [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #51616
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, 7.0.x
  • [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #51612
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, 6.0.x
  • Optimize CancellationToken handling #51660
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Respect "grpc-status-details-bin" trailer on error response #51394
    area-grpc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Use IProblemDetailService in ValidationProblem #51464
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Update area-owners.md #51647
    area-infrastructure
